document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Volkovitsh, Mark G. & Bellamy, Charles L.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalogue of the Buprestidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Buprestoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalogue of the Buprestidae of Iran (Coleoptera: Buprestoidea)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host plant(s) within Iran .
(Adult) Tamarisk (
Tamarix
sp., Tamaricaceae ) (
Abai & Adeli 1984
;
Modarres Awal 1997
).

Distribution outside Iran .
Afghanistan , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Iraq , Kazakhstan , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Turkey , Uzbekistan (
Bílý et al . 2011
).

Distribution outside Iran .
Algeria , Chad , Djibouti , Egypt , Erithrea, Ethiopia , Greece , Israel , Jordan , Lebanon , Libya , Morocco , Oman , Saudi Arabia , Senegal , Sudan , Syria , Tanzania , Tunisia , Turkey , UAE , Yemen (
Bílý et al . 2011
).
